title: Minutes of Tainan City Government’s 452nd Municipal Administrative Meeting Mayor’s remarks 8/18/2020
content: Mayor’s Remarks:Now is the peak season for a variety of vegetables, fruits, and agricultural produce, including avocado, pomelo, honey, and longan, which are all local specialties of Tainan. Currently, the city government is working on developing new markets. With the goal of increasing farmers’ income, bureaus should first consider local produce or flowers when choosing gifts for Mid-Autumn Festival or during other exchanges between governmental agencies.
